website_summaries.verdict: Enjoy blue or white light therapy in six light intensity levels.
pros: Full-spectrum light exposure for up to 10,000 LUX with UV-free light
Compact design is portable enough for travel
Light is easy to tilt and adjust
cons: Some users found the white light settings to be a bit too bright

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this light!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this light! The size is perfect - it's easy to use anywhere - on the table while reading, while using the desktop computer, while crocheting, I even used it on the kitchen counter this morning while making & packing today's lunch. I especially like all the options it has: 2 colors of light, 3 intensities in each color, and the timer function is fantastic. This is SO much nicer than the light box I had years ago that was huge and only had 2 settings - on and off. Highly recommend this for anyone who suffers from SAD; it's a life-saver.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this and it was great but it won't turn on now. I used it for a few weeks, and then put it away for a few weeks while the weather was great. I pulled it out again and I can't get it to turn on. I see no reason why it shouldn't work. I'm very disappointed with it.
customer_reviews.author: jethrobyn

customer_reviews.title: I am a believer
customer_reviews.text: I have had depression for most of my 30+ years of life. My therapist and psychiatrist has been recommending I get this for years. I was skeptical, but I finally realized how much happier I am in the summer when I get more sunlight. This doesn't take the place of natural light but it is pretty close. I could not believe how I felt better with this light on. I wish I would have gotten one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Hull

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, love the timer function, but wish it had a battery
customer_reviews.text: I find the white light setting to be too bright, but the blue light setting is great. I love the timer, and it's a good reminder, when working at the computer with it on, to take an eye break and stretch. I wish it had a battery in it though, so it could be more easily taken around. As it is, you're confined to a space with an outlet.
customer_reviews.author: pokhalo

customer_reviews.title: Second season brings a high pitched hum
customer_reviews.text: Last season it was fine. Brought it out for this season to find a high pitched hum that is intolerable for more than a couple minutes. Since it is supposed to be relatively close to your face while using, this is really bothersome. For the price, I would have thought I could use it for more than a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product until it stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Had it four months. Used once a week. It died. That pretty much says it all.
customer_reviews.author: Citizen Can

customer_reviews.title: Blue light highly recommended by Mayo Clinic web site on SAD.
customer_reviews.text: As described! Fine product of quality! Like the option of blue BEA white lite! And didn't think I'd use the USB plug but I have used it to recharge my phone whilst sitting in front of the light!
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - not real blue light
customer_reviews.text: Im disappointed ... this does NOT have a true blue light, it’s only a warm white and a cool white setting. I have a real blue light (phillips) that a friend is using to help with winter blues. I know what the lights should look/feel like. Will probably return this at the end of the week unless it surprises me. Bright light is simply not enough for me, I need the blue spectrum.
customer_reviews.author: T. Naude

customer_reviews.title: I wish it had a better timer as it jumps from 15-30 minutes so I ...
customer_reviews.text: It works. I wish it had a better timer as it jumps from 15-30 minutes so I have to do 15, then restart for 5-10 more minutes. Minor I know, but annoying when your brain is half asleep. Size is fine and I like the adjustable base.
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH PIDGEON

customer_reviews.title: Default settings are bad
customer_reviews.text: I need a full hour of light during the winter on the brightest setting, and the timer on this one only goes up to 30m. So if I want to use this, I have to first press the "up brightness" button three or four times, and then the "increase timer" button three or four times to bring it from 5m (!!!) to 30m. And then I have to do it again 30m later. There is no way to just "turn it on" and have it stay on. This can get pretty annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Yoon

customer_reviews.title: Blue, White, BRIGHT
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. If anything changes, I will edit this review. EDIT: Just out of curiosity, I measured the output from my light from about a foot away. I hit the screenshot on my phone, and as you can see, when the light is turned to its brightest white setting, the output is 30,000 lux. Nice! (I used SensorLab from the play store to measure.)
customer_reviews.author: Sean and Michele

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This light is garbage. Don’t waste your money. It stopped working completely after one day. Spend money on a better, higher quality light. This is total trash.
customer_reviews.author: mandyslife

customer_reviews.title: Bipolar Spouse Doesn't Like It
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my bipolar spouse and she does not like it!! Boxed it up and set it in a corner!!
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Cadney

customer_reviews.title: A Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I live in Portland, OR—where the sun don't shine. This light has gotten me through more dark and gloomy Pacific Northwest days than I can count without me wanting to crawl back in bed right after breakfast. One of these days, I'm gonna have to move; but until then, I can survive the 6 to 8 months per year of gloomy grey skies here, all due to my trusty PureGuardian.
customer_reviews.author: VitaminO

customer_reviews.title: This product has what I need.
customer_reviews.text: Working well, so far. I like that it has choices in strength, is portable, has both blue and white light options, and it has a timer. So, basically, it has everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one for a gift. Within a week or two, one of them stopped working, just does not turn on. Other reviews mention the same problem, should have heeded the warning. At least the Amazon return procedure is user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Trip

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm a day sleeper and it definitely helps my mood.
customer_reviews.author: ConsumerLuvr

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sun Lamp (except for the noise)
customer_reviews.text: Good quality lamp, but my only complaint is that it makes a constant humming noise when it is on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible noise
customer_reviews.text: Ug. This is my first one of these, so I don't know, maybe it's normal but this things makes this horrible, high pitched whinning. You're supposed to sit close to it but at that distance it's whinning right in your ear. It's so obnoxious I'm not sure I'll be able to use it at all. Update: I'm sending this back. I investing in a different brand that is silent.
customer_reviews.author: NomiAlder

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is big for my nightstand, but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is already helping with the seasonal blues.
customer_reviews.author: Mburge

customer_reviews.title: I like the size
customer_reviews.text: I like it and have only used it for a week, I think it helps S.A.D.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too sure about this light therapy.....
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been trying this light for a while, not sure it has made much of a difference for me. Not convinced.
customer_reviews.author: bruv

customer_reviews.title: A great little light with cool options!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this light to replace another brand/style I had for years for use in my windowless office. I have not been using it for that long, so I can't give it 5 starts just yet...Yet, while there's nothing like the real thing, the light does make a difference in my ability to focus. I love that this version has blue or white light, intensity options, and an automatic timer! I would definitely recommend it for making small, dark spaces more uplifting.
customer_reviews.author: noevilstar74

customer_reviews.title: It died with very little use!
customer_reviews.text: It died with very little use. Is there a way to reset it? Complete loss of power!
customer_reviews.author: Zmann

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It sits next to my computer monitor ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It sits next to my computer monitor at work and I use it until I go to lunch. I do wish you could set for 1 hour instead of just 30 minutes but restarting it is not difficult. Whenever co-workers come in to complain about the day, I make them sit in front of the light while they complain. I could be nuts, but I think the technique is working. I really think they go away calmer. Maybe I should buy them each their own so they leave me alone.
customer_reviews.author: BE of ohio

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: This quit working 3 months after we purchased it. I tried using it again today and it lights up for 5 min and shuts off. Then you have to wait before it will turn back on, if it doesn’t flicker. Disappointed, I should have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: StacieLS

customer_reviews.title: LIGHT THERAPY IS WORKING
customer_reviews.text: I get depressed every winter, my dr. recommended light therapy. This light is very bright and can be dimmed, or changed to blue light. Has a timer on side.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie S.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this SAD light for my wife who definitely suffers depression during ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this SAD light for my wife who definitely suffers depression during the winter when we have less sunlight. She has been using it faithfully morning and evening for a couple of months and I can definitely tell the difference in her mood. She is happier and laughs for often
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: I like it. It feels like it's working to me
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It feels like it's working to me. I only use it for 5 or 10 minutes at a time twice a day. If the light is too bright you can adjust it but then you need to use it longer. It's small. A little bigger than in ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney A

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It's the size of an iPad , takes up little space and actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Casby

customer_reviews.title: Really bright
customer_reviews.text: Great to have some light this past winter. Not sure if I used it enough.
customer_reviews.author: S. G

customer_reviews.title: A few months in, it now high pitched buzzes
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the product for the first couple of months but it now makes a very high pitched buzz whenever it is turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Erin McMillin

customer_reviews.title: I use this lamp at least twice a day now ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this lamp at least twice a day now that winter has arrived. Living in a snow belt, it's often gloomy here in Western NY. This helps.
customer_reviews.author: Western NY Reader

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Feels cheaply made but I feel like it ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Feels cheaply made but I feel like it helps.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wood

This compact energy light lamp provides up to 10,000 LUX of light to help you beat the winter blues. It is designed to provide you with full spectrum light exposure that is beneficial when daylight is limited or you spend a portion of your day in dimly lit surroundings. The SPA Energy light is UV free and includes features that allow you to customize the duration of your daily session, your preferred light intensity, blue or white tint and duration. The compact portable design allows you to set the light on the table or desk for use while you’re eating breakfast, planning your day, even working on your computer. No need to worry about buying or replacing bulbs, the SPA Energy light was designed with long lasting, LED lights. The white or blue light option provides you with your preferred color and intensity.
